title: subject
description: subject metadata for an IC Electrophysiology session during a Patch-seq experiment

Specimen ID.$comment: does specimenID include genotype, creLine, reporterStatus?

Sample ID.description: The unique identifier of the biological sample

Sample Type.description: The specimen type of the biological sample. See Specimen Types in the Controlled Vocabulary.

species.description: Common english name for the species of the sample.

Species NCBI Taxonomy ID.description: The unique identifier for the species of the sample.

subjectAge.description: Age of the donor subject when the sample was taken. Add a value and units, (e.g. '8w'; 'P56')

subjectDateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of subject. Can be supplied instead of 'age'.

specimenID.description: The unique identifier of the parent specimen associated with this sample.

creLine.description: Reporter gene; modified part of the mouse genome to target a certain cell type.

reporterStatus.description: Cre+ (positive =  fluorescent label) or Cre- (negative = no flourescent label).
